str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular
str2: To admonish, advise, exhort. From para and aineo; to mispraise, i.e. Recommend or advise.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
From euthumos; to cheer up, i.e. be cheerful; neuter comparative more cheerfully.
For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A casting away, rejection, a loss. From apoballo; rejection; figuratively, loss.
From psucho; breath, i.e. spirit, abstractly or concretely.
However, nevertheless, but, except that, yet. From pleion; moreover, i.e. Albeit, save that, rather, yet.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A ship, vessel, boat. From pleo; a sailer, i.e. Vessel.
